tool_description: MAC Address Lookup to find the hardware manufacturer and its postal address of a specific MAC Address
title: MAC Address to Manufacturer

api_list.name: maclookup
api_list.description: Enter MAC Address (string) to find the manufacturer. MAC Formats Allowed: ('xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx', 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx', 'xxxx.xxxx.xxxx', 'xxxxxxxxxxxx')
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mac-address-to-manufacturer.p.rapidapi.com/maclookup/{mac_number}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mac-address-to-manufacturer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

0.Vendor Address: Lot 8, Jalan Hi-Tech 2/3 Kulim Kedah MY 09000

parameters.name: mac_number
parameters.description: MAC Address Number to Find Manufacturer

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the manufacturer for the MAC address 00:1A:2B:3C:4D:5E?
I need to find out which company made the device with MAC address 12-34-56-78-9A-BC.
What is the hardware manufacturer for the MAC address 1234.5678.9ABC?
Please look up the manufacturer for the MAC address 98-76-54-32-10-FF.
Find the company associated with the MAC address 00:0C:29:3E:5B:7F.
Could you provide the manufacturer details for the MAC address 001122334455?
I want to know the manufacturer of the device with MAC address AB-CD-EF-12-34-56.
What company is linked to the MAC address 11:22:33:44:55:66?
Can you find the manufacturer for the MAC address 1234.5678.ABCD?
Please tell me the hardware manufacturer for the MAC address 00-14-22-01-23-45.
